name: VandY
description:
VandY derives its name from the two words Vardhini and Yatharth, meaning, growth and reality respectively, in Sanskrit. Established in 1997, with its head office located in the beautiful city of Chandigarh (Northern India), VandY started its operations with a humble staff strength of 10 employees, operating in only one Indian state.
Since then, it has grown rapidly and now stands tall and ripe with experience and with operations spread in 37 cities across 5 Indian states and 1 union territory.
